description: yeehaa is an ecosystem architect with a PhD in Philosophy, blending academia and tech expertise. As an entrepreneur, thinker, and coder, he's passionate about transforming education and knowledge sharing. He founded Offcourse and created the Superconnectors event format, advocating for an impactful and inclusive internet. Based in Taipei, yeehaa focuses on uniting people around common values and translating shared visions into effective ecosystems. His work explores concepts like ecosystem architecture, internet fragmentation, and the global village in the digital age. yeehaa's courses cover topics such as personal growth, web innovation, and valuing differences, reflecting his multidisciplinary approach to fostering thriving, decentralized organizations and communities.
blurb: yeehaa, an ecosystem architect with a PhD, blends academia and tech to transform education and knowledge sharing. He explores concepts like ecosystem architecture and internet fragmentation, focusing on uniting people around common values and creating effective ecosystems.
